Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5366 affecting package openvswitch for versions less than 2.17.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-5366 affecting package openvswitch for versions less than 2.17.9-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openvswitch is earlier than 2.17.9-1, affected by CVE-2023-5366
